guis

Class SaveLoadButtonListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • guis.SaveLoadButtonListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class SaveLoadButtonListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    Saves current progress from the canvas onto a file or Loads in up a file to continue where the user left off.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private CSGFrame parentFrame
      The parent which implements the loadMap and saveMap methods.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SaveLoadButtonListener(CSGFrame parentFrame)
      This internal listener handles the save and load button's functions and calls the proper methods.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
      Loading or saving according to the already set action commands.
      private void loadGameMap()
      Loads in a grid of tiles from a file.
      private void saveGameMap()
      Saves current progress into a file.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • parentFrame

        private CSGFrame parentFrame
        The parent which implements the loadMap and saveMap methods. The parentFrame decides when to save and how to load a specific map.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SaveLoadButtonListener

        public SaveLoadButtonListener(CSGFrame parentFrame)
        This internal listener handles the save and load button's functions and calls the proper methods. This listener is used for loading and saving maps.
        Parameters:
        parentFrame - this is the CSGFrame which we save the map from and load the map to.

    • Method Detail

      • actionPerformed

        public void actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
        Loading or saving according to the already set action commands.
        Specified by:
        actionPerformed in interface java.awt.event.ActionListener
        Parameters:
        e - the current ActionEvent.

      • loadGameMap

        private void loadGameMap()
        Loads in a grid of tiles from a file. Also draws the fresh array of tile onto the canvas. Uses a file chooser to load a map from (somewhere).

      • saveGameMap

        private void saveGameMap()
        Saves current progress into a file. Uses a file chooser to save the map to (somewhere).
